data.fluent-bit.conf:
[SERVICE]
   Flush        1
   Daemon       Off
   Log_Level    info
   Log_File     /u01/logs/fluentbit
   Parsers_File /fluent-bit/parser/parsers.conf

[INPUT]
   Name            tail
   Path            /u01/logs/*.log
   Path_Key        source
   Exclude_Path    *.[1-9].log
   Read_From_Head  true
   Tag             application-log4j
   DB              /u01/logs/application.db
   Buffer_Max_Size 512k
   Skip_Long_Lines On
   Mem_Buf_Limit   10MB
   Rotate_Wait     10
   Key             event

[INPUT]
   Name            tail
   Path            /u01/logs/*.access
   Path_Key        source
   Exclude_Path    *.[1-9].access
   Read_From_Head  true
   Tag             access-access_combined
   DB              /u01/logs/access.db
   Buffer_Max_Size 512k
   Skip_Long_Lines On
   Mem_Buf_Limit   10MB
   Rotate_Wait     10
   Key             event

[INPUT]
   Name             tail
   Path             /u01/logs/fluentbit
   Path_Key         source
   Tag              fluentbit
   Refresh_Interval 5
   Read_from_Head   true
   Key              event

[FILTER]
   Name             stdout
   Match            fluentbit

[FILTER]
   Name parser
   Match *-log4j
   Key_Name event
   Parser timeParser
   Preserve_Key On
   Reserve_Data On

[FILTER]
   name multiline
   match *-log4j
   multiline.key_content event
   multiline.parser multiline-log4j

[FILTER]
   name multiline
   match_regex ^(ats:eval:|evalevent_)xml$
   multiline.key_content event
   multiline.parser multiline-evalevent-xml

[FILTER]
   Name  modify
   Match *
   Add   host ${POD_NAME}
   Add   environment ${POD_NAMESPACE}
   Add   version 0
   Add   nodetype openshift
   Add   name simple
   Add   cluster utv

[OUTPUT]
   Name                       splunk
   Match                      application-log4j 
   Host                       ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port                       ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token               ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS                        On
   TLS.Verify                 Off
   event_index                test-index
   event_sourcetype           log4j
   event_host                 ${POD_NAME}
   event_source               $source
   event_field                application $name
   event_field                cluster $cluster
   event_field                environment $environment
   event_field                nodetype $nodetype
   event_field                version $version
   event_key                  $event
   net.keepalive_idle_timeout 10
   Retry_Limit 5

[OUTPUT]
   Name                       splunk
   Match                      access-access_combined 
   Host                       ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port                       ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token               ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS                        On
   TLS.Verify                 Off
   event_index                test-index
   event_sourcetype           access_combined
   event_host                 ${POD_NAME}
   event_source               $source
   event_field                application $name
   event_field                cluster $cluster
   event_field                environment $environment
   event_field                nodetype $nodetype
   event_field                version $version
   event_key                  $event
   net.keepalive_idle_timeout 10
   Retry_Limit 5

[OUTPUT]
   Name                       splunk
   Match                      fluentbit 
   Host                       ${SPLUNK_HOST}
   Port                       ${SPLUNK_PORT}
   Splunk_token               ${HEC_TOKEN}
   TLS                        On
   TLS.Verify                 Off
   event_index                test-index
   event_sourcetype           fluentbit
   event_host                 ${POD_NAME}
   event_source               $source
   event_field                application $name
   event_field                cluster $cluster
   event_field                environment $environment
   event_field                nodetype $nodetype
   event_field                version $version
   event_key                  $event
   net.keepalive_idle_timeout 10
